title: Quick guide for ETC Tools
content:
The home page shows a set of tools.

1. Start a tool in one of the two ways:
Click on a green Begin [Tool Name] button on the homepage.
Click on a tool under the site Menu at the top left corner of the screen.

2. Each tool consists of an input step, several processing steps, and an output step. Follow the on-screen instruction or the instructions in Help menu (top right corner) to complete the necessary steps.

3. Your progress is shown on the upper part of the screen in each tool.

4. The final step provides the location of output files if any is generated. Take note of the file location, then go to File Manager to retrieve or download the output.

The site Menu is located on the left side corner of screen on each page. Mouse-over the menu to see the utilities and tools provided on the site.

title: Quick guide for ETC Utilities
content:
The site Menu is located on the left side corner of screen on each page. Mouse-over the menu to see the utilities and tools provided on the site.

Utilities include:
1. File Manager enables the user to upload, download, edit, or delete user-uploaded or system-generated files.

2. Task Manager shows the active jobs a user started and job status. The user can share or delete a job there.

3. My Account allows user to change account information, set email notification, and set connections with other resources, such as OTO.
